original_text: And Judas and Silas, who were themselves prophets, encouraged and strengthened the brothers with many words.
korean_text: 유다와 실라도 선지자라 여러 말로 형제를 권면하여 굳게 하고

sentences.original_text: And Judas and Silas, who were themselves prophets
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 유다와 실라, 그들 역시 선지자들이었으니

sentences.original_text: encouraged and strengthened the brothers with many words.
sentences.korean_translation: 많은 말로 형제들을 격려하고 힘을 주었습니다.
